def arr_check(arr):
    return all(isinstance(el, list) for el in arr)

def arr_check(arr):
    return all(isinstance(a, list) for a in arr)

def arr_check(arr):
    return all(type(ele) is list for ele in arr)

def arr_check(arr):
    return all(type(i) == list for i in arr)

def arr_check(arr):
    return all(type(i) is list for i in arr)

def arr_check(arr):
    return all(type(e) == list for e in arr)

def arr_check(arr):
    return sum([isinstance(x, list) for x in arr]) == len(arr)

def arr_check(arr):
    return len([el for el in arr if type(el) == list]) == len(arr)
